resources.string: Press back button/use the gesture again to exit
APK to be installed was not found. Please restart patching process.
APK to be installed was not found. Okkei Patcher will now abort restoring process.
Backup of CHAOS;CHILD was not found.
CHAOS;CHILD was not found on this device.
Downloaded OBB is corrupted. Please try restarting patch process.
Downloaded scripts are corrupted. Please try restarting patch process.
Failed to access a file to download. Contact the creator of this application.\nError description: %1$s
An error occurred while downloading file. Check your internet connection and try again.
An error occurred while installing APK. Please try again.
Manifest is corrupted. Okkei Patcher can\'t proceed. Please try to restart Okkei Patcher.
Manifest download failed. Okkei Patcher can\'t proceed. Please restart Okkei Patcher.
Not enough free disk space. Ensure that you have at least 2 GB of free space.
Okkei Patcher can\'t get permission to install packages.
Okkei Patcher can\'t get permission to read from and write to external storage.
APK to be installed might be not created by Okkei Patcher. Please restart patching process.
APK to be installed might be not created by Okkei Patcher. Okkei Patcher will now abort restoring process.
OBB file was not found. Okkei Patcher will abort current process.
CHAOS;CHILD was not uninstalled. Please try again.
Okkei Patcher update is corrupted. Try again later.
Send \"bugreport.log\" file located in /sdcard/Android/data/%1$s/files/ directory to the creator of this application.
For proper work Okkei Patcher needs an internet connection to download data about patch and updates. Before you proceed by clicking OK ensure that you have stable internet connection.
You will now be prompted to install updated Okkei Patcher. Please confirm the installation. Note that after that Okkei Patcher will be closed and you\'ll have to relaunch it manually.

A new version of Okkei Patcher is available!
Current version: %1$s
Download size: %2$s MB
Changelog:
%3$s
Patch update is available! Click PATCH button to download and apply the update.\nDownload size: %1$s MB

Okkei Patcher requires permission to install applications from unknown sources to continue. After pressing the OK button you will be redirected to your device settings where you should enable this option. Then you can return to Okkei Patcher using the back button or gesture.
Okkei Patcher requires permission to read from and write to external storage to proceed. Would you like to try to grant permission again? Otherwise Okkei Patcher will be closed.

Okkei Patcher requires permission to read from and write to external storage to proceed. Would you like to try to grant permission again? If you click OK you will be redirected to Okkei Patcher settings where you should go to permissions settings and enable storage permission. Otherwise Okkei Patcher will be closed.
Are you sure you want to abort the process? Your CHAOS;CHILD installation and/or Okkei Patcher data may be damaged.

You\'re about to clear ALL Okkei Patcher data including backup of your old CHAOS;CHILD installation. Use this ONLY when reinstalling CHAOS;CHILD because of data damage. This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to clear all data?
You\'re about to download %1$s MB of data. Ensure that you have stable internet connection. It is recommended to use unmetered internet connection (such as Wi-Fi).
This process can take quite a long time. If you abort it or close Okkei Patcher your CHAOS;CHILD installation and/or Okkei Patcher data may be damaged. Are you sure you want to start the process?
Save data backup was not found or is corrupted. Okkei Patcher can not restore your save data.
Save data was not found. Okkei Patcher can not perform backup of your current save data and will continue.
